content: this hat features a 6-stitch cable with a 6 row repeat it looks great in a variety of yarns and makes a quick gift-knitting or i-need-a-hat-now project you can purchase an ad free pdf copy on etsy 1 1 https //www etsy com/listing/730967416/gingerbread-hat-pattern-pdf ref=shop_home_active_7&crt=1
